programme.title: Ishqiya
programme.desc: Khalujaan and Babban, two thugs, are on the run from their boss. They seek refuge at an old friend’s house but meet Krishna, his widow, instead. Both of them fall for her, oblivious to the fact that Krishna is manipulating them for her own gain.

programme.title: Annadata
programme.desc: After realising that his relatives care only about his riches, an elderly noble man Ambaprasad discards his wealth and leaves home in search of happiness.

programme.title: Baatein Kahi Ankahi
programme.desc: Watch Baatein Kahi Ankahi with RJ Anmol In An Exclusive Interview With Bollywood Stars.

programme.title: Jeevan Dhaara
programme.desc: A strong, idealistic girl Sangeeta (Rekha) secretly dreams of getting married but is unable to do so due to her poor financial conditions. She’s the only earning member of her house where she lives with her unemployed siblings, school-going nephews and ageing parents. Will she ever get to live her dream marital life?

programme.title: Rajnigandha
programme.desc: Deepa (Vidya Sinha), a highly qualified girl with simple dreams, is betrothed to Sanjay (Amol Palekar), a forgetful, tardy but lovable and caring boyfriend. Deepa goes to Mumbai for a job interview and chances upon Navin (Dinesh Thakur), her old boyfriend from college who was a passionate youngster and has now become a responsible and successful man. Through the course of the story, Deepa finds herself caught in a dilemma as she reminisces her past with Navin and her future with Sanjay. Will Navin's sudden appearance in her life change her heart?

programme.title: Kunwara
programme.desc: Raju and Urmila fall for each other in New Zealand and promise to meet in India. On his journey in India, Raju meets pregnant Sharmila. To help her, Raju meets her family as her husband and realises that Sharmila is none other than Urmaila’s sister.

programme.title: Aflatoon
programme.desc: To become a millionaire quickly, Raja poses as a professor and lures an rich heiress Pooja, hoping to marry her. But trouble begins when he is blamed for crimes committed by his evil lookalike Rocky.

programme.title: Mujhse Shaadi Karogi
programme.desc: Sameer, a hot-tempered guy relocates to Goa, where he falls in love with Rani. However, his new roommate Sunny puts a spoke in the wheel upon his arrival and Rani finds herself in a dilemma as she starts liking both Sameer and Sunny.
